message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. I think it would be perfect for you! I'm asking for $18,000. Let me know what you think.
I'm very interested in the product, but $18,000 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?
Bob, thanks for the offer! I understand where you're coming from, but the value of this product is truly significant. How about we meet halfway between our previous offers at $15,000?
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but $15,000 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to go up to $13,000. Would you be willing to accept that price?
Bob, I appreciate you working with me on this.  $13,000 is close, but to be fair to myself I can't go any lower than $14,000.  This is a great deal for you, what do you say?
I understand that you're trying to get a good price, but $14,000 is still a bit steep for me. I'm willing to meet you at $12,500. This is my final offer, so I hope we can come to an agreement.
